commit.message:
Implement P0962

* parser.c (cp_parser_perform_range_for_lookup): Change
the condition for deciding whether to use members.

From-SVN: r258803

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@

+
+	Implement P0962
+	* parser.c (cp_parser_perform_range_for_lookup): Change
+	the condition for deciding whether to use members.
+
